EmailTemplate.name: SWBR-202309-HP-GOVT-MHPA-WEBINAR.01d - Post-Event (On-demand Webinar: Diabetes M
EmailTemplate.subject: On-demand Webinar: Diabetes Management for High-Risk Medicaid Populations
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Engaging the Hard to Reach: Diabetes Management for High-Risk Medicaid Populations Shannon Stepp, Senior Director of Health Plan Strategy at Teladoc Health, Hunter Sinclair, Vice President of Solution Strategy at Teladoc Health, and Adrian Sovik, RN, Regional Director of Healthcare Management at Amerigroup, recently sat down to discuss their partnership in deploying an effective Diabetes Management solution to high-risk Medicaid populations in Texas and Nebraska. Listen to their conversation to gain: - Understanding of the program that Amerigroup and Teladoc Health launched together and its goals - Clarity about how Amerigroup and Teladoc Health partnered to exceed engagement targets - Insight into clinical results and estimated HEDIS impact from this program Presenters: Shannon Stepp Senior Director of Health Plan Strategy, Teladoc Health Adrian Sovik, RN Regional Director of Healthcare Management, Amerigroup Hunter Sinclair Vice President of Solution Strategy, Teladoc Health About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
